title: Lover Unexpected: Sappho Edition
description: Girlfriends share lots of things, including their most sinful secrets. When those secrets involve love, lust and long denied desire, sparks are sure to fly. And sometimes, there is no denying the need for a woman’s touch. In this volume you’ll find seven delicious stories of sensual, daring women who open their hearts to discover love, fulfillment and satisfaction—closer than they expected.****~7 Author Anthology~Finally Found by Lucy FelthouseThe Dating Game by Doris O’ConnorWrong Side of the Fence by Erin M. LeafEven Porn Stars Fall in Love by Luxie RyderWanting Jane by Emma ShorttMarilyn in the Middle by Giselle RenardeNew Beginnings by Eve Meridian
author: Marie Medina
